00082 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace>
00083 class coo_matrix : public detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::coo_format>
00084 {
00085   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::coo_format> Parent;
00086   public:
00089     template<typename MemorySpace2>
00090     struct rebind { typedef cusp::coo_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace2> type; };
00091         
00094     typedef typename cusp::array1d<IndexType, MemorySpace> row_indices_array_type;
00095     
00098     typedef typename cusp::array1d<IndexType, MemorySpace> column_indices_array_type;
00099     
00102     typedef typename cusp::array1d<ValueType, MemorySpace> values_array_type;
00103     
00106     typedef typename cusp::coo_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> container;
00107 
00110     typedef typename cusp::coo_matrix_view<typename row_indices_array_type::view,
00111                                            typename column_indices_array_type::view,
00112                                            typename values_array_type::view,
00113                                            IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> view;
00114     
00117     typedef typename cusp::coo_matrix_view<typename row_indices_array_type::const_view,
00118                                            typename column_indices_array_type::const_view,
00119                                            typename values_array_type::const_view,
00120                                            IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> const_view;
00121 
00124     row_indices_array_type row_indices;
00125     
00128     column_indices_array_type column_indices;
00129 
00132     values_array_type values;
00133 
00136     coo_matrix() {}
00137 
00144     coo_matrix(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries)
00145       : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries),
00146         row_indices(num_entries), column_indices(num_entries), values(num_entries) {}
00147 
00152     template <typename MatrixType>
00153     coo_matrix(const MatrixType& matrix);
00154 
00157     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries)
00158     {
00159       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00160       row_indices.resize(num_entries);
00161       column_indices.resize(num_entries);
00162       values.resize(num_entries);
00163     }
00164 
00169     void swap(coo_matrix& matrix)
00170     {
00171       Parent::swap(matrix);
00172       row_indices.swap(matrix.row_indices);
00173       column_indices.swap(matrix.column_indices);
00174       values.swap(matrix.values);
00175     }
00176 
00181     template <typename MatrixType>
00182     coo_matrix& operator=(const MatrixType& matrix);
00183 
00186     void sort_by_row(void);
00187     
00190     void sort_by_row_and_column(void);
00191     
00196     bool is_sorted_by_row(void);
00197     
00202     bool is_sorted_by_row_and_column(void);
00203 }; // class coo_matrix
00222 template <typename Array1,
00223           typename Array2,
00224           typename Array3,
00225           typename IndexType   = typename Array1::value_type,
00226           typename ValueType   = typename Array3::value_type,
00227           typename MemorySpace = typename cusp::minimum_space<typename Array1::memory_space, typename Array2::memory_space, typename Array3::memory_space>::type >
00228           class coo_matrix_view : public cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::coo_format>
00229 {
00230   typedef cusp::detail::matrix_base<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace,cusp::coo_format> Parent;
00231   public:
00232     typedef Array1 row_indices_array_type;
00233     typedef Array2 column_indices_array_type;
00234     typedef Array3 values_array_type;
00235     
00238     typedef typename cusp::coo_matrix<IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> container;
00239 
00242     typedef typename cusp::coo_matrix_view<Array1, Array2, Array3, IndexType, ValueType, MemorySpace> view;
00243 
00246     row_indices_array_type row_indices;
00247     
00250     column_indices_array_type column_indices;
00251     
00254     values_array_type values;
00255 
00256     // construct empty view
00257     coo_matrix_view(void)
00258       : Parent() {}
00259 
00260     // construct from existing COO matrix or view
00261     template <typename Matrix>
00262     coo_matrix_view(Matrix& A)
00263       : Parent(A),
00264         row_indices(A.row_indices),
00265         column_indices(A.column_indices),
00266         values(A.values) {}
00267   
00268     // TODO check sizes here
00269     coo_matrix_view(size_t num_rows,
00270                     size_t num_cols,
00271                     size_t num_entries,
00272                     Array1 row_indices,
00273                     Array2 column_indices,
00274                     Array3 values)
00275       : Parent(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries),
00276         row_indices(row_indices),
00277         column_indices(column_indices),
00278         values(values) {}
00279 
00282     void resize(size_t num_rows, size_t num_cols, size_t num_entries)
00283     {
00284       Parent::resize(num_rows, num_cols, num_entries);
00285       row_indices.resize(num_entries);
00286       column_indices.resize(num_entries);
00287       values.resize(num_entries);
00288     }
00289     
00292     void sort_by_row(void);
00293     
00296     void sort_by_row_and_column(void);
00297     
00302     bool is_sorted_by_row(void);
00303     
00308     bool is_sorted_by_row_and_column(void);
00309 };

00313 template <typename Array1,
00314           typename Array2,
00315           typename Array3>
00316 coo_matrix_view<Array1,Array2,Array3>
00317 make_coo_matrix_view(size_t num_rows,
00318                      size_t num_cols,
00319                      size_t num_entries,
00320                      Array1 row_indices,
00321                      Array2 column_indices,
00322                      Array3 values)
00323 {
00324   return coo_matrix_view<Array1,Array2,Array3>
00325     (num_rows, num_cols, num_entries,
00326      row_indices, column_indices, values);
00327 }
00328 
00329 template <typename Array1,
00330           typename Array2,
00331           typename Array3,
00332           typename IndexType,
00333           typename ValueType,
00334           typename MemorySpace>
00335 coo_matrix_view<Array1,Array2,Array3,IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>
00336 make_coo_matrix_view(const coo_matrix_view<Array1,Array2,Array3,IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>& m)
00337 {
00338   return coo_matrix_view<Array1,Array2,Array3,IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>(m);
00339 }
00340     
00341 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace>
00342 typename coo_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>::view
00343 make_coo_matrix_view(coo_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>& m)
00344 {
00345   return make_coo_matrix_view
00346     (m.num_rows, m.num_cols, m.num_entries,
00347      make_array1d_view(m.row_indices),
00348      make_array1d_view(m.column_indices),
00349      make_array1d_view(m.values));
00350 }
00351 
00352 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, class MemorySpace>
00353 typename coo_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>::const_view
00354 make_coo_matrix_view(const coo_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>& m)
00355 {
00356   return make_coo_matrix_view
00357     (m.num_rows, m.num_cols, m.num_entries,
00358      make_array1d_view(m.row_indices),
00359      make_array1d_view(m.column_indices),
00360      make_array1d_view(m.values));
00361 }
